alert.note: Alert for Lake; Newton (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 27 at 11:30AM EST until January 31 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Illinois and Indiana... Iroquois River at Iroquois affecting Iroquois and Newton Counties. Sugar Creek at Milford affecting Iroquois County. Kankakee River at Momence affecting Kankakee County. Vermilion River near Leonore affecting La Salle County. Kankakee River at Shelby affecting Newton and Lake (IN) Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by a combination of snowmelt and heavy river ice. * WHERE...Kankakee River from near I-65 and De Motte downstream to the IL/IN state line, including the Shelby gauge. * WHEN...Until Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...At 10.5 feet, water overflows low-lying river banks along Bluegrass Road and in Wildwood Estates east of Sumava Resorts. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM CST Saturday, the river stage was 10.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow morning to a crest of 10.8 feet Monday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 10.5 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: River rises are being affected by significant river ice cover and by snowmelt. Significant river ice cover can lead to ice jams that cause large water level fluctuations and flooding with little advanced notice. A Flood Warning means that water levels above flood stage are imminent or may already be occurring. Persons along rivers and streams in the warned area should take immediate precautions to protect life and property. Report flooding to the National Weather Service or your local law enforcement agency only when you can do so safely. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued by late tonight at 430 AM CST.
